About the Company: SJVN Ltd is engaged in hydroelectric power generation originally established as a joint venture between the government and the state government of Himachal Pradesh to develop and operate the Nathpa Jhakri Hydro Power Station (NJHPS).The company is currently constructing the Rampur Project, which is expected to be a 412 MW hydroelectric power generation facility located downstream from the NJHPS.SJVN has also entered into memoranda of understanding with the state government of Uttarakhand for three hydroelectric projects.The company has also diversified their operations to target hydroelectric power projects available outside India, and has been awarded the rights to construct and operate on a build, own, operate and transfer (BOOT) basis.
